00020 #include <rdkcore/logging/logging.h>
00021 #define LOGGING_MODULE "RMapImage"
00022 
00023 #include "rmapimagediffrect.h"
00024 #include "rmapimagediffpoints.h"
00025 
00026 namespace RDK2 { namespace RMaps {
00027 
00028 vector<ObjectDiff*> RMapImage::splitInDiffs(size_t maxSize)
00029 {
00030     RMapImageDiffRect* bigDiff = new RMapImageDiffRect(this, 0, 0, image->getWidth(), image->getHeight());
00031     vector<ObjectDiff*> ret = bigDiff->split(maxSize);
00032     delete bigDiff;
00033     return ret;
00034 }
00035 
00036 bool RMapImage::applyDiff(const ObjectDiff* diff)
00037 {
00038     const RMapImageDiffRect* rectDiff = dynamic_cast<const RMapImageDiffRect*>(diff);
00039     if (rectDiff) {
00040         x = rectDiff->refMapImageX;
00041         y = rectDiff->refMapImageY;
00042         theta = rectDiff->refMapImageTheta;
00043         realWidth = rectDiff->refMapImageRealWidth;
00044         image->applyDiff(rectDiff->imageDiffRect);
00045         return true;
00046     }
00047     const RMapImageDiffPoints* pointsDiff = dynamic_cast<const RMapImageDiffPoints*>(diff);
00048     if (pointsDiff) {
00049         x = rectDiff->refMapImageX;
00050         y = rectDiff->refMapImageY;
00051         theta = rectDiff->refMapImageTheta;
00052         realWidth = rectDiff->refMapImageRealWidth;
00053         image->applyDiff(pointsDiff->imageDiffPoints);
00054         return true;
00055     }
00056     return false;
00057 }
